familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president of Pine Hill Development LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former director and chairman/president of Pine Hill Development Managing Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
